ast.name: TD-Quest
ast.comment:
A work in progress attempt to bring an X-Quest clone to Touchdevelop. Implemented features:

• collectible crystals

• bullets (tap to fire)
• movement controls closer to X-Quest

• game loop skeleton
• walls
• hero movement

body.text: Here we will check for our own bullets, powerups, etc

app.comment:
A work in progress attempt to bring an X-Quest clone to Touchdevelop. Implemented features:
• score
• lives
• basic level progression

• collectible crystals

• bullets (tap to fire)
• movement controls closer to X-Quest

• game loop skeleton
• walls
• hero movement

A work in progress attempt to bring an X-Quest clone to Touchdevelop. Implemented features:
• bullets are back
• smoother animations
• better controls responsiveness
